feed.title: The Chapter Stability
feed.subtitle: Welcome to the temple. Please silence.

entry.title: Ore Buie
entry.content:
Nelle mie ore buie
nessuna luce è accesa
e sono in una stanza buia
a cercare un gatto nero
che non solo c’è
ma è inoltre un drago
incazzato nero.
entry.summary: Nelle mie ore buienessuna luce è accesae sono in una stanza buiaa cercare un gatto neroche non solo c’è ma è inoltre un dragoincazzato nero.

entry.title: Zichtbaar
entry.content:
Ik had het voor een dag
dan had ik het niet meer
deed mijn ogen even dicht
en was het er alweer.
entry.summary: Ik had het voor een dagdan had ik het niet meerdeed mijn ogen even dichten was het er alweer.

entry.title: Muffins
entry.content:
Aan het bakken in het zon
muffins aan het eten
er is toch niks anders
dat ik zou willen weten.
entry.summary: Aan het bakken in het zonmuffins aan het etener is toch niks andersdat ik zou willen weten.

entry.title: At The End Of The Rope

link.title: At The End Of The Rope

entry.content:
Strange
to feel these new boundaries
measure these new distances
it’s still me at the end of the rope
the same dream, weakness, hope,

if I hold you up
will you hoist yourself
until you can’t see the ground?

I can’t pull anymore
to see what’s on your side
it’s enough to hit the ground
to see my castle bend
I have enough cracks
to which I need to tend
so climbing up that rope
is a choice we take alone.
entry.summary: Strangeto feel these new boundariesmeasure these new distancesit’s still me at the end of the ropethe same dream, weakness, hope,if I hold you upwill you hoist yourselfuntil you can’t see the ground?I can’t pull anymoreto see what’s on your sideit’s enough to hit the groundto see my castle bendI have enough cracksto which I need to tendso climbing up that ropeis a choice we take alone.

entry.title: Sunday
entry.content:
I remember the last time
I let the sun shine on me
I was trying to defend it
but my gun pointed at me.
entry.summary: I remember the last timeI let the sun shine on meI was trying to defend itbut my gun pointed at me.

entry.title: Hook
entry.content:
Will it crack before it breaks
is that all the sound it makes?
Will it take all that it takes
to lose all that it found
and shake all that it took
off of that iron hook?
entry.summary: Will it crack before it breaksis that all the sound it makes?Will it take all that it takesto lose all that it foundand shake all that it tookoff of that iron hook?

entry.title: Lull
entry.content:
I could lull your mind to rest
but not put your heart to sleep
it’s my mind that I know best
but it’s yours I’d rather reap.
entry.summary: I could lull your mind to restbut not put your heart to sleepit’s my mind that I know bestbut it’s yours I’d rather reap.

entry.title: Still Be Here
entry.content:
Will you still be here
when my whites go black
hold your hand against mine
when I’ll have a broken back
stare deep into my eyes
when they’ll be shining tears
listen to my heart when
you won’t hear what it hears
entry.summary: Will you still be herewhen my whites go blackhold your hand against minewhen I’ll have a broken backstare deep into my eyeswhen they’ll be shining tearslisten to my heart whenyou won’t hear what it hears

entry.title: Stuff I Speak Of
entry.content:
The stuff I speak of can’t be told
not made out of our same mold
we copy it on the copies
of the paper we can’t fold
to write our dreams in swans,
origami ones,
knowing they’ll never
never really fly away.
entry.summary: The stuff I speak of can’t be toldnot made out of our same moldwe copy it on the copiesof the paper we can’t foldto write our dreams in swans,origami ones,knowing they’ll nevernever really fly away.

entry.title: Care
entry.content:
Good that you took care of me
in my moments of weakness
sometimes too crushed
to even hold our breath in our skins
still we had the love
to keep our bones together
like ducklings through the weather
penguins in the storm
that’s where we were born.

Can we be close to Earth?
Tempting empty spaces
tend to us their wounded eyes
asking to be filled
with more than gaseous ice.
entry.summary: Good that you took care of mein my moments of weaknesssometimes too crushedto even hold our breath in our skinsstill we had the loveto keep our bones togetherlike ducklings through the weatherpenguins in the stormthat’s where we were born.Can we be close to Earth?Tempting empty spacestend to us their wounded eyesasking to be filledwith more than gaseous ice.
